title: Bank's rights and duties with respect to deposit
context: ยง490:9-341 Bank&rsquo;s rights and duties with respect to deposit account. Except as otherwise provided in section 490:9-340&copy;, and unless the bank otherwise agrees in an authenticated record, a bank&rsquo;s rights and duties with respect to a deposit account maintained with the bank are not terminated, suspended, or modified by: (1) The creation, attachment, or perfection of a security interest in the deposit account; (2) The bank&rsquo;s knowledge of the security interest; or (3) The bank&rsquo;s receipt of instructions from the secured party. [L 2000, c 241, pt of ยง1]
